alert.note: Alert for Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 02 at 8:56AM EST until January 02 at 1:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to 1 to 1.5 feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT SOUTH BAY AT LINDENHURST NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.1 FT, MAJOR 2.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/10 AM 3.0/ 3.5 1.0/ 1.5 1.0/ 1.5 0 MINOR 02/10 PM 2.1/ 2.6 0.6/ 1.1 0.9/ 1.4 0-1 NONE 03/10 AM 2.2/ 2.7 0.8/ 1.3 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE 03/10 PM 1.9/ 2.3 0.4/ 0.9 0.7/ 1.1 0-1 NONE 04/11 AM 2.2/ 2.7 0.8/ 1.3 0.7/ 1.1 0 NONE 04/11 PM 1.9/ 2.3 0.4/ 0.9 0.7/ 1.1 0 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WEST SAYVILLE NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.2 FT, MAJOR 2.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/10 AM 2.8/ 3.2 1.1/ 1.6 1.2/ 1.7 0-1 MINOR 02/10 PM 1.8/ 2.2 0.5/ 1.0 1.0/ 1.5 1 NONE 03/11 AM 1.9/ 2.3 0.6/ 1.1 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE 03/11 PM 1.5/ 2.0 0.2/ 0.7 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE 04/12 PM 1.9/ 2.3 0.6/ 1.1 0.7/ 1.1 0 NONE 05/12 AM 1.5/ 2.0 0.2/ 0.7 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WATCH HILL/FIRE ISLAND NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.2 FT, MAJOR 2.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/09 AM 2.7/ 3.1 0.9/ 1.4 1.0/ 1.5 0-1 NONE 02/10 PM 1.6/ 2.0 0.2/ 0.7 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE 03/11 AM 1.8/ 2.2 0.4/ 0.9 0.4/ 0.9 1 NONE 03/10 PM 1.4/ 1.9 0.0/ 0.5 0.5/ 1.0 1 NONE 04/11 AM 1.8/ 2.2 0.4/ 0.9 0.5/ 1.0 0 NONE 05/12 AM 1.5/ 2.0 0.1/ 0.6 0.5/ 1.0 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
